name: FireArm
description: Yeehaw! Welcome to the Wild West, amigo! You're the sheriff of this here town, but rumor has it a gang of cowboy boot outlaws are on their way. Stop 'em from getting into town by firing off your finger gun! The more boots you hit, the more praise you'll get from the townsfolk. But if any boots get past you, those points will be quickly lost. Saddle up and show those no good boots some frontier justice! [Pyde file; Created in Python using Processing 3.0]
